translations: 涉及（relate 的 ing 形式）；关联；叙述

sentences.sentence: A dozen other journalists have also been charged with offenses relating to the new laws.
sentences.translation: 另外12名记者也被控与新法律有关的违法行为。

sentences.sentence: All good targets should have multiple criteria relating to critical factors such as time, money, quality and customer feedback.
sentences.translation: 所有好的目标都应该有多个与时间、金钱、质量、顾客反馈等关键因素有关的标准。

sentences.sentence: He has no compunction about relating how he killed his father.
sentences.translation: 他毫无悔意地讲述了他如何杀死自己的父亲。
